documents.document:
Hello!!

Hello Everyone!! I am very excited to be here....I never heard of Facebox until I got an invite in my e-mail...Thanks Yulia!!
I am hoping that I get the chance to meet and get to know alot of new people. I have recieved a few messages already...so I am looking forward to knowing them.
Well I have been boring u long enough for today....so have a great day and I will talk to you soon!!!

New Apartment

Hello all!! Well I have spent 2 nights in my new apartment and I love it....I thought I was going to be scared because I have never moved into a place by myself....but it is FABULOUS!!! I am so happy here....I feel independent for the first time in along time... I am going to move the rest of my stuff today and hopefully by friday I will be all settled....Well got to go....talk to you all later!!

Hello ALL!!

Hope you all are having a Fabulous day!! I am!! I have had a pretty busy week...I have got all my stuff moved into my new place..the fun part of putting it all away has begun..LOL!! It has been fun for the most part! I have sore muscles,but it is worth it...I have gotten enough excerise to last me a year..up and down the stairs with heavy boxes is a killer....but no pain no gain!! LOL!! I hope to be all settled by Tuesday...I just want to be able to chill out. Well I think I have bored you all enough for one day...Talk TO You Later!!

GOOD AFTERNOON!!

HELLO ALL!! HOPE YOU ARE ALL HAVING A FABULOUS DAY...I AM!! I AM ALMOST DONE UNPACKING...THANK THE LORDY!! I AM SO TIRED I JUST WANT TO SIT AND CHILL OUT! I THINK THIS PLACE IS LOOKING RATHER GOOD...LOL...WELL I THINK I NEED TO GO FOR NOW! HOPE YOU LIKED READING ABOUT MY BORING LIFE....SEE YA

Hello Everybody!!

Well it has been awhile since I have written so I thought I would write to say HELLO!!....I am so happy I am finally all in my new place and everything is unpacked and put away!! It is so beautiful...no more boxes sitting around....it is FABULOUS!!!.....I am so loving it even more now!!...Let see whatelse is happening o well here is news...COLTS are 9-0!!! YIPPEE!!! They are awesome...everytime they play I feel a heart attack coming but Manning seems always use his magic and it is all ok...LOL!!... I am alittle conflicted with next weeks game...They play the Cowboy's!! I like the Cowboy's Romo has made a huge difference on that team and they seem to be pulling it together. I am having a feeling that i am going to need a nerve pill before it is over...LOL....Well I better go..I have said enough for today!!!

Hello Dahlings!!

Well today was a day of good and bad news...Good News: Jimmy Johnson wins the chase!! That is nothing but Sweet!!! Bad news Colts lose to the Cowboys....Sad day!! but I have to admit that the Cowboys have really pulled together as a team lately..Romo is an awesome Quaterback...(Not to mention Hot!!)...I am happy they won well deserved and the Colts just didn't play well...Let's just hope they kick some Eagle butt next week...Well I think that is about it for now...bye!!

Happy Thanksgiving!!

Happy Thanksgiving!!! I just wanted to wish you all a happy holiday....I am going to tell you what I am Thankful for this year...My Family and Friends...They are the best bunch of Turkeys I know...lol...Seriously I am thankful to them because they have all been there for me when I needed them to be...I love them all dearly...So what are you all Thankful For??

Hello!!

I just wanted to say hi!! I have been kind of busy lately with the holiday and all...Which was great!! I had a great Turkey Day...Hope all of you did as well...It was great to see my family...we watched the Macy's Parade and football ate dinner and the we made the annual trip to see the christmas lights in the park....Fabulous!! I ate way to much....it was great...can't wait til Christmas!! Well I guess I better go for now!! Have a great day and I will write again soon!!

JUST A FEW RANDOM THOUGHTS FOR THE DAY!!

I HAVE BEEN THINKING ABOUT THIS FOR A FEW DAYS...WHY IS IT THAT WE FIND OUT HOW SOMEONE REALLY FEELS WHEN IT IS TO LATE TO DO ANYTHING ABOUT IT.....I KNOW THAT IF SOMETHING IS MEANT TO BE IT WILL BE...I JUST DON'T GET IT..HOW CAN SOMEONE SAY THEY CARE ABOUT YOU AND WANT TO BE IN YOUR LIFE AND THEN JUST TURN AROUND WALK AWAY LIKE IT IS NO BIG DEAL...I DON'T KNOW HOW TO SHUT OFF EMOTIONS LIKE THAT...I GUESS MAYBE I SHOULD LEARN THIS SO I WON'T GET MY HEART BROKEN ANYMORE...ANYONE ELSE HAVE THOUGHTS ABOUT THIS???

WHAT A FABULOUS DAY!!

IT WAS A GOOD DAY TODAY...I WAS ABLE TO ATTEND A BABY SHOWER AND STILL WATCH SOME GOOD FOOTBALL....HOW OFTEN DOES THAT HAPPEN...LOL...COLTS LOST TODAY BUT HEY THE COWBOYS PULLED IT OUT SO HEY IT WAS A GOOD DAY...ESPECIALLY IF U ARE A KICKER...GOOD THING VANDERSMACK GOT FIRED THE COWBOYS COULD HAVE LOST TODAY..LOL...WELL THATS ALL I GOT FOR NOW..ANYONE ELSE HAVE COMMENTS ON TODAYS GAMES??

THIS SUCKS!!

I CAN'T GET TO MY INBOX....AND IT IS TELLING ME I HAVE 2 MESSAGES WAITING FOR ME... JUST SITTING THERE WAITING TO BE READ....DANG IT....I CAN'T TAKE IT....THE SUSPENSE IS KILLING ME.....LOL....IS THIS NOT BOTHERING ANYONE ELSE......I MEAN IT COULD BE MR.WRONG..I MEAN RIGHT..LOL....PROFESSING HIS LOVE..LOL..SERIOUSLY HOW MANY WOMEN OUT THERE GET THE SAME THING I GET...YOU SAY HI...AND THEIR RESPONSE IS..I LOVE YOU..LOL..ARE THEY SERIOUS??...LOL..YOU GET THAT LITTLE VOICE IN YOUR HEAD...SCREAMING CRASY WACKO!! O AGAIN THAT JUST MAY BE ME...LOL...I TELL THEM TO SHUT UP BUT THEY NEVER DO...LOL....SORRY I AM JUST IN THAT SILLY MOOD TODAY...BYE FOR NOW

Christmas!!

Well it is starting to look like Christmas at my house....I finally got my tree put up...It looks pretty good if I do say so myself...LOL...It didn't happen without a few tears..ok alot of tears...but it is just that this is my first Christmas without my ex-husband and it is kind of hard...I was fine putting up the tree..and then i go and get the Christmas socks and here comes the tears...I remember putting it up last year and it was so much fun....It isn't that I am not over him because I so am...I am much better now..I sat down and got it all out...Geez I hate crying over that jacksmack....he so doesn't deserve the time or the effort it takes to blow ones nose..but from what my sister said it is normal..so Thank the Lordy..I am not crazy... Well I better go I got to go to work soon....Bye for now!!

Morning all!!

Good Morning all!! I hope you are all doing well...I am alittle sleepy but feeling good... So the reason for this blog is to see if anyone else has ever been to see a Fortune Teller....I have seen two in my lifetime...The first time I went everything she told me happened to my sister....She said I was going to move to the east coast and that they man would have 2 kids..Well my sister is living in Norfolk,VA..with a man that has two kids...lol....crazy!!....The second one told me...that I was going to meet my soulmate by Christmas...well it is what about 10 days until Christmas and nothing..if it going to happen it better happen fast...She hit everything with my best friend Angela...I am starting to think that I am doomed....I just would like to know if anyone else believes in this stuff and if you have ever had anything happen to them that a Fortune Teller said would happen to them....just curious....thanks for you time.....talk to you later

NEW ARRIVALS

I AM GETTING TWO NEW MEMBER OF MY HOUSEHOLD NEXT WEEK....TWO LITTLE DOGS...A MOMMA AND DAUGHTER...I AM VERY HAPPY.....NOW I HAVE TO PICK NAMES....NOT SURE WHAT TO NAME THEM.....I AM THINKING ABOUT ZSA ZSA AND EVA.....BUT NOT 100% YET.......I BELIEVE THEY ARE YORKIES OR AT LEAST HAVE YORKIE IN THEM...I AM GETTING THEM FOR AN ANIMAL SHELTER IN FLORIDA....SO I GUESS I WILL KNOW WHAT TO NAME THEM WHEN I SEE THEM....WELL GOT TO GO FOR NOW..JUST HAD TO TELL THE GOOD NEWS!!

BAD NEWS!!

NO DOGS FOR ME......THEY WERE ADOPTED OUT ON SATURDAY....SO I GUESS IT JUST WASN'T MEANT TO BE...WHICH SEEMS TO BE A MAJOR PATTERN FOR ME LATELY....YOU WOULD THINK I WOULD GET USED TO IT BY NOW....EVERYONE SAYS IT GETS EASIER...THAT MAYBE TRUE....BUT I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW WHEN...BECAUSE I AM NOT SURE HOW MUCH MORE I CAN TAKE...IT GETS HARDER WITH EVERY DISAPPOINTMENT TO KEEP A SMILE ON THIS FACE....I AM TO THE POINT WHERE I JUST DON'T WANT TO GET EXCITED ABOUT ANYTHING...BECAUSE IT IS NOTHING BUT A MAJOR LET DOWN... DAMN I NEED TO STOP BEING SUCH A WHINEY BABY...MY LIFE COULD BE WORSE...WELL GOT TO GO FINISH FEELING SORRY FOR MYSELF..TALK TO YOU ALL LATER!! HOPEFULLY IN A BETTER MOOD!!

CHRISTAMS!!

I HOPE YOU ALL HAD A FABULOUS CHRISTMAS!! I KNOW I DID!!! I GOT SOME GREAT STUFF....BUT IT WAS JUST BEING WITH MY FAMILY THAT WAS THE BEST....WE ALWAYS HAVE FUN TOGETHER....IT WAS ALITTLE SAD BECAUSE MY SISTER AND HER BOYFRIEND WEREN'T HERE,BUT NEXT YEAR THEY WILL BE....AND THEN IT WILL FEEL LIKE CHRISTMAS....I AM LOOKING FORWARD TO THEM MOVING BACK TO INDIANA FROM VIRIGINA......I AM GOING TO TAKE MY VACATION TO GO AND HELP THEM MOVE BACK HERE...I WANT TO TAKE TWO WEEKS....ONE WEEK TO SPEND RELAXING ON THE BEACH AND THE OTHER GETTING THEM SETTLED....I AM SO EXCITED...I THINK THAT IS GOING TO BE THE BEST CHRISTMAS GIFT NEXT YEAR IS HAVING THE WHOLE FAMILY TOGETHER AGAIN...WELL I BETTER GO I NEED TO GO TO WORK SOON...TALK TO YOU ALL LATER!!

I adopted a puppy!!

I finally found a puppy that fits me!! He is so cute...I got him from the Animal Shelter here in Indy...He looks like alittle peanut butter cup!! It was love at first site....He is so loveable and cuddlely....I get to pick him up on Friday...I will be posting pics of him so everyone can see how cute he is....His name is Reese Cup....lol...but we are going to call him R.C. I am so excited to bring him home....My best friend Justin made him a dog house and got him a tag for his collar...It is so cute...I got him little bowls and snacks....I think Justin and Angela are just as excited as I am...Well I just had to share the good news!! Bye for now all!!

COLTS!!

THE COLTS ARE GOING TO THE SUPERBOWL!! I AM SO EXCITED!!...THE GAME WAS SO EXCITING...I WAS ON THE EDGE OF MY SEAT....IT WAS SO AWESOME....PAYTON IS THE COME BACK KID....HOPEFULLY WE STICK IT TO THE BEARS!! GO COLTS!!!

I'm back!!

Hey everyone!! I hope you are all well. I have been really busy lately and my computer was down for awhile...but all better now and I am very excited to get back.... Let's see what's been going on lately...Well nothing much just working alot and taking care of my pup..Gosh he is so big now....He loves to chew up everything in sight...My best friend had her baby and Gosh I just love that little girl...She is so beautiful and sweet...She is such a good baby...Well I guess that is it for now..bye!!
